attributes.action: Stop paying the unemployed  parents for extra children born while the parent are on state benifits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the area where i live we have lots of young families who are on the benifit system. They are having more children so that they can claim more money from the state. I think that the state should not pay for these extra children as the parents should have known that they could no afford to have them and rather than breeding they should be out looking for employment
